name: Software Developer (Разработчик програмного обеспечения)
description: We are looking for Software Developers to join our existing international team!   Компания LIN SCAN более 20-ти лет занимается предоставлением сервисных услуг по внутритрубной диагностике и организации очистных мероприятий с использованием высокотехнологичного оборудования для компаний нефте-газового комплекса (как на Российском, так и на международном рынках). Мы являемся Компанией- производителем, имеем собственные производства и представительства в России и за ее пределами. Головной офис Компании расположен в ОАЭ.   Software Developer with the experience in Finance domain  ERP Application with the experience : 4 years of exp in .Net technologies Description : - Experienced in Finance domain and ERP Applications. - Design, implement and maintain .Net application within all phases of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) - Develop, test, implement and maintain application software working with established processes - Communicate effectively with other engineers and other stake holders - Establish, refine and integrate development and test environment tools and software as needed - Identify opportunities to fine-tune and optimize applications of .Net developed projects - Ability to work in a fast-paced team environment - Develops innovative approaches. - Sought out as expert. - Providing integration and deployment strategy. - Strong knowledge design principles, patterns, and best practices - Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements - Proficient in C#.Net - Solid understanding of the Software development life cycle Skills : C#, ASP.Net, Web API, LINQ, SQL Server, JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS Education : Bachelor of Engineering / Master of Computer Application or any equivalent degree. Functional Area : IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance
